contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 25, 2018 D Swiss National Championships (First Division)
Swiss National Championships (First Division) 10 Test Piece Contest Swiss National Championships swiss-national-championships-first-division
Switzerland
First
Excalibur
Music and Convention Centre (Auditorium Stravinski), Montreux, VD, Switzerland March 2018: SBBV has now decided to establish a new Section between 1st and CS. Responding to several Problems/Questions especially over the last few Years (large Number of Bands around 20, Set Works, Individual Band Development, etc.). This shell relieve the Adjudicators and the whole Competition. Mode: Planned to ascend the two best ranked Bands to Elite Section in the following Year (if a Band renounces the next lower placed can move up instead).
Commence 9 am.
Best Solo Euphonium: Beat Steiner, BB Konkordia Büsserach
Jan. 28, 2017, 1:29 p.m. Sept. 3, 2019, 9:35 a.m.
1 Brass Band Fribourg B Maurice Donnet-Monay
2 Brass Band Harmonie Neuenkirch Manuel Imhof
3 RosAlp Brass Band David Bonvin
4 BML Talents Patrick Ottiger
5 Ensemble de Cuivres AMBITUS Francois Roh
6 Brass Band Kirchenmusik Flühli Armin Renggli
7 Oberwalliser Brass Band David Lochmatter
8 Brass Band Konkordia Büsserach Tristan Uth
9 Regional Brass Band Bern Manuel Renggli
10 Brass Band Schötz Urs Bucher
11 Feldmusik Knutwil Gian Walker
